scripts.stop: if [ -f cross-word-app.container.id ]; then echo 'Stopping container...'; docker stop `cat cross-word-app.container.id`; echo 'Removing container...'; docker rm `cat cross-word-app.container.id`; echo 'Removing container id file.'; rm cross-word-app.container.id; else echo 'No container id file.'; fi
scripts.kill: if [ -f cross-word-app.container.id ]; then echo 'Killing container...'; docker kill `cat cross-word-app.container.id`; echo 'Removing container id file.'; rm cross-word-app.container.id; else echo 'No container id file.'; fi
scripts.sbs: npm stop && npm run build && npm start
scripts.kbs: npm run kill && npm run build && npm start
